channel.title: Need help with an NPC
channel.description:
I want to know how to place an npc for my server I will add a pic (from another thread) My server is not Hippescape my servers name is Mupescape v1 and I want wise old man old man on my server to say "Welcome to Mupescape v1!!" (without quotes even though most of you people already know that) I want it to start off around my training spot which is xcoord: 3191 ycoord: 3431 (facing south) on one side and xcoord:3199 ycoord:3431 (facing south) on the other. I want both of them to stay still without movement. I will appreciate some help from you people and even though probably most of you people don't even know what I am talking about...
This is from my previous thread then someone told me "To place an npc follow below: -Go to autospawn.cfg after you have got the ID number for the npc you want -You will see the coords copied and pasted 3 times. -It will say the npc ID and change that after you copied and pasted another npc. -Find the case where the npc talk in npchandler.java and changewhat it says (add the ID above) A bit obvious. And most people probs knows what ur talking about. You already posted half of what you wanted with the choords in the speech above? So I dont know why you posted that."
what do I do with "Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption"???If any of you people respond thanks for help :)

item.title: Need help with an NPC
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

Use a different account and see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with an NPC
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

when I do as told I replaced everything I was suppost to under autospawn.cfg and NPCHandler.java I saved them and compiled them it works when I log in until it shows nothing but black on the screen then like 1 minute later it says error connecting to server and kicks me off the account. what do I do?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with an NPC
item.dc:creator: @Drew_Scape Drew_Scape
item.description:
@Drew_Scape wrote:

Height: 0
RangeX1: 0
RamgeY1: 0
RangeX2: 0
RangeY2: 0
WalkType: 2
Description: Wise Old Man

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with an NPC
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I want to know how to place an npc for my server I will add a pic (from another thread) My server is not Hippescape my servers name is Mupescape v1 and I want wise old man old man on my server to say “Welcome to Mupescape v1!!” (without quotes even though most of you people already know that)
I want it to start off around my training spot which is xcoord: 3191 ycoord: 3431 (facing south) on one side and xcoord:3199 ycoord:3431 (facing south) on the other. I want both of them to stay still without movement. I will appreciate some help from you people and even though probably most of you people don’t even know what I am talking about…

This is from my previous thread then someone told me
“To place an npc follow below:
-Go to autospawn.cfg after you have got the ID number for the npc you want
-You will see the coords copied and pasted 3 times.
-It will say the npc ID and change that after you copied and pasted another npc.
-Find the case where the npc talk in npchandler.java and changewhat it says
(add the ID above)
A bit obvious. And most people probs knows what ur talking about. You already
posted half of what you wanted with the choords in the speech above? So I dont know
why you posted that.”

what do I do with “Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption”???If any of you people respond thanks for help

Read full topic
